start.text: You awake in a small clearing surrounded by trees.

field.text: You pass through the trees and arrive at a field. You see a garden. It is well-tended. Behind it is a small cottage.

cottage.text: You enter the cottage. It is dark. Suddenly you hear a sound like a large creature charging toward you. Then nothing.

riverbank.text: You arrive at the bank of a large river. The water is rushing past you. There is a small boat tied to a stake. The water is thrashing it wildly.

river.text: You board the boat and untie the rope. Suddenly the boat is speeding along the water. You lose control and fall into the river. You cannot swim.

market.text: You arrive at a grand bazaar. A strange looking merchant approaches you. She offers you something. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want this anymore‚Äù, she says. It is glowing in her hand.

take.text: You take the item. It is like a small jewel. You can feel your tension being released. ‚ÄúCongratulations,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúThis is the win stone.‚Äù
